mapper.select: select sum(selng_qy) as selng_qy, sum(selng_qy * selng_price) as total_price, selng_price, h.menu_cd, h.menu_name from dailyselling d, head_menu h where frcs_id = #{frcsId} and trunc(selng_date, 'MM') = trunc(#{thisMonth}, 'MM') and d.menu_cd = h.menu_cd group by h.menu_cd, h.menu_name, selng_price

select sum(selng_qy) as selng_qy, sum(selng_qy * selng_price) as selng_total, selng_price, h.menu_cd, h.menu_name from dailyselling d, head_menu h where frcs_id = #{frcsId} and trunc(selng_date,'MM') >= add_months(trunc(#{thisMonth}, 'MM'), -2) and d.menu_cd = h.menu_cd group by h.menu_cd, h.menu_name, selng_price

select sum(selng_qy) as selng_qy, sum(selng_qy * selng_price) as selng_total, selng_price, h.menu_cd, h.menu_name from dailyselling d, head_menu h where frcs_id = #{frcsId} and trunc(selng_date,'MM') >= add_months(trunc(#{thisMonth}, 'MM'), -5) and d.menu_cd = h.menu_cd group by h.menu_cd, h.menu_name, selng_price
select nvl(sum(selng_price*selng_qy),0) as total_price from dailyselling where frcs_id = #{frcsId} and trunc(selng_date, 'MM') = trunc(#{thisMonth}, 'MM')
